abstract.original_text: Travel health Travel abroad Pretravel Assessment Posttravel Assessment

sentences.segment_text: Travel health Travel abroad Pretravel Assessment Posttravel Assessment

abstract.original_text: Primary care providers manage the majority of travel medical care. The purpose of the pretravel visit are risk assessment and mitigation. Encourage travelers to enroll in the Smart Traveler Enrollment Program for travel advisories. The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention travel website offers destination-specific, point-of-care resources for clinicians and travelers. Travelers who are visiting friends and relatives are a high-risk group.

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention travel website offers destination-specific ,
point-of-care resources for clinicians and travelers .
Travelers who are visiting friends and relatives are a high-risk group .

abstract.original_text: The most common syndromes in returning travelers are gastrointestinal, febrile, and dermatologic.

sentences.segment_text: The most common syndromes in returning travelers are gastrointestinal , febrile , and dermatologic .
